definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
7th earthly branch: 11 a.m.-1 p.m., noon, 5th solar month (6th June-6th July), year of the Horse/ancient Chinese compass point: 180° (south)
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

pinyin: Ge2 lin2 ni2 zhi4 ben3 chu1 zi3 wu3 xian4

sentences.english: The compound formulation for calendered belt of steel- belted radial tire was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 試驗研究半鋼子午線輪胎壓延法帶束層膠配方。

sentences.english: This was the first measurement of the meridian ever done in the world.
sentences.chinese: 唐朝測出子午線的長度，在當時的世界上還是第一次。

sentences.english: Loosen the setscrew that secures the ring with the time meridian indicator.
sentences.chinese: 鬆開固定時間子午線指示環的定位螺絲。

sentences.english: So, the Greenwich Meridian would be here, now, the one on the x axis.
sentences.chinese: 因此本初子午線應該在這裏，也就是x軸。

sentences.english: Finally it gives the method to solve the equation of orbital curve intersecting meridian at fixed angle.
sentences.chinese: 最後給出了與子午線交定角的軌線方程的解法。

sentences.english: A design of SUV tubeless radial tire is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹SUV型無內胎子午線輪胎的設計。

sentences.english: but my favorite novel by him is "Blood Meridian".
sentences.chinese: 但我最喜歡的小說還是他寫的《血色子午線》。

sentences.english: In between the meridians is a non-moving energy system known as the space between.
sentences.chinese: 在子午線間是一個非移動的能量系統，即間隔空間。

sentences.english: The course which will cut each meridian at the same angle is termed a rhumb line.
sentences.chinese: 與每一子午線相交成同一角度的航向叫恆向線。

sentences.english: Once again, it's important to note that this occurred at the Greenwich meridian.
sentences.chinese: 再說一遍，記住這發生在本初子午線很重要。

sentences.english: The heat build-up of 10 rubber compounds in a radial tire was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究子午線輪胎用10種膠料的生熱特性。

sentences.english: Turn the ring until the time meridian offset scale.
sentences.chinese: 旋轉這個環直到時間子午線偏移刻度。

sentences.english: UK scientists believe the meridian's role in timekeeping is under threat.
sentences.chinese: 英國科學家相信，子午線在計時角色上已受到威脅。

definition: Yongdingmen, front gate of the outer section of Beijing's old city wall, torn down in the 1950s and reconstructed in 2005

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Mao4 yi4 Zhong1 xin1
